Module project.c195pa
Package DAO

Class ApptDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.ApptDAO
public class ApptDAO extends Object
ApptDAO class manages the Appointment methods used to interact with the database.

    • ApptDAO

      public ApptDAO()

  • Method Details

    • getEveryAppt

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getEveryAppt(String check)
      An Observable list is populated with all the appointments from the database.
      Returns:
      allAppts all appointments.

    • addAppt

      public static boolean addAppt(Appointments appts) throws SQLException
      Method that adds an appointment to Appointment in database. If appointment has end date/time before start date/time, appointment falls outside business hours, or appointment overlaps with an already existing appointment, then user will receive an error message. If no errors received, then appointment is added to database using a SQL insert statement.
      Parameters:
      appts - user selects the "add" button.
      Returns:
      false if an Error message occurs.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs when accessing the database.

    • apptOverlap

      public static boolean apptOverlap(Appointments appts) throws SQLException
      Using a SQL query to view all appointments by a Customer ID, the appointment to be modified is compared to the user's existing appointments, to ensure it does not overlap. If user attempts to add an appointment that overlaps an already existing appointment that the user already has, then an error message will appear.
      Returns:
      true if appointment overlaps an already existing appointment.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs when accessing the database.

    • getHighestApptID

      public static int getHighestApptID() throws SQLException
      Get the highest (maximum) appointment ID from the database. When adding a new appointment, the appointment ID is generated by getting the highest appointment ID and adding 1 to it.
      Returns:
      highestId the highest (maximum) appointment ID.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs when accessing the database.

    • modifyAppt

      public static boolean modifyAppt(Appointments appts) throws SQLException
      Method that modifies an existing appointment in the database. If modified appointment has end date/time before start date/time, appointment falls outside business hours, or appointment overlaps with an already existing appointment, then user will receive an error message. If no errors received, then modified appointment replaces/updates existing appointment using a SQL update statement to the database.
      Parameters:
      appts - user selects the "modify" button.
      Returns:
      false if an Error message occurs.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs when accessing the database.

    • deleteAppt

      public static boolean deleteAppt(int appointmentID) throws SQLException
      Delete appointment by appointment ID. User receives an information alert if appointment is able to be successfully deleted.
      Returns:
      rowsDeleted if appointment is successfully deleted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs when accessing the database.

    • getAppt

      public static Appointments getAppt(int appointmentID) throws SQLException
      Get appointment by appointment ID from database using a SQL query.
      Returns:
      new appointment match found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs when accessing the database.

    • reviewClosestAppts

      public static void reviewClosestAppts()
      Upon login, all appointments are checked to see if the user has any upcoming appointments within the next 15 minutes. If they do or do not have an upcoming appointment, the user will receive a warning alert (if they do have an upcoming appointment) or an information alert (if they do not have an upcoming appointment).

    • getCustAppts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getCustAppts(int contactID)
      Used by the Customers by Contact report, where an observable list is generated with all appointments for a contact ID.
      Returns:
      appts all appointments for a Contact ID.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs when accessing the database.

    • getApptsMonthReview

      public List<MonthReview> getApptsMonthReview() throws SQLException
      For the appointment by month and type report, appointment data for month and type is gathered from the database.
      Returns:
      monthReview appointments by month, type and total.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs when accessing the database.

    • openHoursChecker

      public static boolean openHoursChecker(LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime)
      Method used when attempting to save or add an appointment to check to ensure the appointment falls within business hours (8am to 10pm Eastern Time).
      Returns:
      insideOpenHours whether appointment is or is not within open office hours.
